title: Add test script for manual workflow verification
description:
Create a test script for manually verifying the agent-human workflow:

scripts/test-handoff-workflow.sh:
```bash
#!/bin/bash
# Test script for agent-human handoff workflow

set -e

echo "=== Creating test epic with mixed tasks ==="

# Create epic
EPIC_ID=$(tk create "Test Handoff Workflow" -t epic)
echo "Created epic: $EPIC_ID"

# Task 1: Normal task (should complete normally)
tk create "Normal task" -t task --parent $EPIC_ID

# Task 2: Pre-declared approval gate
tk create "Security change" -t task --parent $EPIC_ID --requires approval

# Task 3: Will be ejected by agent (manual)
tk create "Configure credentials" -t task --parent $EPIC_ID

echo ""
echo "=== Running ticker (will stop at handoffs) ==="
echo "Run: ticker run $EPIC_ID"
echo ""
echo "Expected flow:"
echo "1. Agent completes 'Normal task'"
echo "2. Agent completes 'Security change' → awaiting approval"
echo "3. Agent ejects 'Configure credentials' → awaiting work"
echo ""
echo "Then run these commands to test human workflow:"
echo "  tk list --awaiting                    # See waiting tasks"
echo "  tk next $EPIC_ID --awaiting          # Get next human task"
echo "  tk approve <task-id>                  # Approve a task"
echo "  tk reject <task-id> 'feedback'        # Reject with feedback"
```

Acceptance criteria:
- [ ] Script creates realistic test scenario
- [ ] Instructions for manual testing included
- [ ] Covers approval, rejection, and eject flows
- [ ] Easy to run and verify
